Name: isolated growth hormone deficiency
Definition: A hypopituitarism characterized by abnormally low levels

Name: adrenocorticotropic hormone deficiency
Definition: A hypopituitarrium that is characterized by a decreased or absent production of adrenocorticotropic hormone by the pituitary gland.

Name: panhypopituitarism
Definition: A pituitary gland disease characterized by the decreased secretion of one or more of the eight hormones normally produced by the pituitary gland.

Name: obsolete gonococcal endocarditis
Definition: A pituitary gland disease characterized by the decreased secretion of one or more of the eight hormones normally produced by the pituitary gland.

Name: obsolete Congenital abnormalities of uterus complicating pregnancy
Definition: A pituitary gland disease characterized by the decreased secretion of one or more of the eight hormones normally produced by the pituitary gland.

Name: obsolete abnormality of organs and soft tissues of pelvis complicating pregnancy
Definition: A pituitary gland disease characterized by the decreased secretion of one or more of the eight hormones normally produced by the pituitary gland.

Name: Sheehan syndrome
Definition: A central nervous system disease that is characterized by an inflammation of the pia-arachnoid meninges. It can be caused by growth of bacteria
